title: Forced adoption: 'My baby was taken'
description: Mothers like Lisa Rolland, who felt pressured to give up her baby, are being asked to tell their stories.

title: Pam & Tommy: Lily James 'a triumph' as Pamela Anderson in new series
description: The former Downton Abbey actress transforms into the Baywatch star for new TV drama Pam & Tommy.

title: Kremlin media: Ukraine preparing to attack, not Russia
description: The threat of a Russian invasion is "imaginary", and Ukraine is a failing state, says Russian TV.

title: Boris Johnson authorised Afghan animal evacuation, leaked email suggests
description: Boris Johnson has previously dismissed as "nonsense" claims he intervened to help an animal charity.

title: Publish Sue Gray's No 10 parties report in full, Starmer urges PM
description: The Labour leader tells Boris Johnson to quit during a bad-tempered series of Commons exchanges.

title: Senegal criticised over handling of Mane head injury
description: Senegal are criticised after Sadio Mane continued playing despite suffering suspected concussion in a "sickening collision" with Cape Verde goalkeeper Vozinha.

title: Sainsbury's asks shoppers and staff to keep wearing masks
description: The retailer will continue asking customers and staff to wear masks in its shops when Plan B rules end on Thursday.

title: Glasgow School of Art: The people still recovering from 2018 fire
description: Locals say the top of Sauchiehall Street still has a "dark, looming presence" from the 2018 blaze.

title: Viral videos, stoicism and stockpiling on Ukraine’s uneasy borders
description: With an estimated 100,000 Russian soldiers now on Ukraine's border, what do Ukrainians make of it all?

title: Ukraine: US could sanction Putin personally if Russia invades, Biden says
description: US president Joe Biden says an invasion would have "enormous consequences" for the world.

title: England captain Farrell needs surgery and will miss entire Six Nations
description: England captain Owen Farrell will miss the entire Six Nations with an ankle injury that requires surgery.

title: Disney responds to Peter Dinklage's criticism of Snow White remake
description: Actor Peter Dinklage called a live-action remake of Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs "backwards".

title: Can Chelsea boss Thomas Tuchel build on 12 months of success at Stamford Bridge?
description: Thomas Tuchel has shown his brilliance and frustration in his first year at Chelsea, but is trying to build foundations for the future at a normally rocky club.

title: Pet spending boom continues despite rising cost of living
description: Pets at Home says it does not expect people to cut back on pet spending as cost of living rises.

title: Texas synagogue siege: Two men arrested in Manchester
description: Two suspects are detained in Manchester as part of the investigation into the attack in Texas.

title: Dozens feared lost as 'smuggling' boat capsizes off Florida
description: US officials say the vessel may have been part of a "human smuggling venture".

title: Dominant Tsitsipas beats Sinner in straight sets to reach semi-finals
description: Stefanos Tsitsipas reaches the Australian Open semi-finals for a third time with a dominant victory over Jannik Sinner.

title: Missing girl meets her rescuer again decades later
description: Back in 1968, toddler Kathy Wrethman went missing in Australia but was recovered safely.

title: Newspaper headlines: PM 'gears up for survival fight'
description: Most papers report on an investigation launched by Scotland Yard into gatherings held in No 10 during the pandemic.

title: Winter Olympics: Kaillie Humphries' 10,000-mile race to reach Beijing 2022
description: Why double Olympic bobsleigh champion Kaillie Humphries needed to name the American president in WW1 to qualify for Beijing 2022.

title: Instagram and Whatsapp stalker's lies 'ruined my life for years'
description: Women who were targeted by Matthew Hardy speak about the impact of his avalanche of messages.

title: Two-thirds with Omicron say they have had Covid before
description: The latest findings hint at how common reinfections might be and who is more likely to catch Covid again.

title: Caroline Flack's former dance school focuses on wellbeing
description: Mental healthcare is a priority at Body Work in Cambridge, where the TV presenter was a student.

title: Winter Olympics: Will the Beijing Games be 'green and clean'?
description: China is promising a greener Winter Olympics, although critics are not sure if it can deliver.

title: 'I grew up in care alone - why did no-one tell me I had siblings?'
description: Ashley John-Baptiste grew up in care, unaware he had siblings. His new documentary is called Split Up in Care: Life Without Siblings.

title: The rejected Dragons' Den contestant now making millions
description: From being rejected on Dragons' Den to making millions, Alex Savelli shares his secrets to success.

title: Major legal changes needed for driverless car era
description: The company behind the driving system would be responsible, rather than the driver says Law Commission.

title: ‘I’m dying’ – Son shares desperate 999 calls
description: Akshay Patel’s six calls to North West Ambulance Service on the night of his mum’s death.

title: Aboriginal Tent Embassy: A powerful beacon of protest for 50 years
description: A protest that began 50 years ago with a beach umbrella remains a potent symbol of Aboriginal activism.
